issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] Add Ballista tests to CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12251](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12251). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ballista is a standalone project (not part of the Arrow Rust workspace) and therefore the tests will not run in CI without additional work.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12251?focusedCommentId=17316355) by Boaz Berman (boazbe):*
I'd love to contribute this, but sure what is the intended outcomes of this and what desired mechanics we would like to have

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12251?focusedCommentId=17318509) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~boazbe]` The goal is to add "cargo build" and "cargo test" for Ballista to the existing github actions for the Rust project. I have an initial PR up (linked to this JIRA) but I immediately ran into an issue with snmalloc.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12251?focusedCommentId=17318859) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9979
